name: Deadly Sky
description:
Attention! Attention!! Attention!!!

Enemy fighters violated intergalactic space and committed treacherous bombing of peaceful settlements!
All our defense forces have been destroyed. BUT! There remains one small fighter with a limited supply of weapons, which belongs to a retired pilot from the Organization for the Control of Intergalactic Borders.

You will have to enter into combat with the superior forces of the enemy and punish the aggressors!


Game features:
• 3 types of weapons
• More than 9 types of enemies
• Bosses
